attributes.action: To make sanitary pads and tampons free for all women!
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s not fair to pay for our basic rights
attributes.background:
To offer free sanitary products too all ladies 
If not at least those who are already seeking finance support via government schemes

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606807

If you want the Government to make sanitary products available in a different way to that requested by the above petition, you could start a new petition stating clearly how you want sanitary products to be made available by the Government.
